20101222161316.000|20101222161316.000|CC1|  DON'T START Enbrel IF YOU HAVE
20101222161316.000|20101222161319.000|CC1|    AN INFECTION LIKE THE FLU.  
20101222161319.000|20101222161319.000|CC1|         TELL YOUR DOCTOR       
20101222161319.000|20101222161321.000|CC1|  IF YOU'RE PRONE TO INFECTIONS,
20101222161321.000|20101222161321.000|CC1|       HAVE CUTS OR SORES,      
20101222161321.000|20101222161324.000|CC1|      HAVE HAD HEPATITIS B,     
20101222161324.000|20101222161324.000|CC1|        HAVE BEEN TREATED       
20101222161324.000|20101222161325.000|CC1|        FOR HEART FAILURE,      
20101222161325.000|20101222161325.000|CC1|     OR IF, WHILE ON Enbrel,    
20101222161325.000|20101222161328.000|CC1|          YOU EXPERIENCE        
20101222161328.000|20101222161328.000|CC1|   PERSISTENT FEVER, BRUISING,  
20101222161328.000|20101222161330.000|CC1|      BLEEDING, OR PALENESS.    
20101222161330.000|20101222161330.000|CC1|     ASK YOUR RHEUMATOLOGIST    
20101222161330.000|20101222161333.000|CC1|   IF Enbrel IS RIGHT FOR YOU.  
20101222161333.000|20101222161333.000|CC1|     AND HELP BRIDGE THE GAP    
20101222161333.000|20101222161336.000|CC1|   BETWEEN THE LIFE YOU LIVE... 
20101222161336.000|20101222161438.000|CC1|  AND THE LIFE YOU WANT TO LIVE.

20101222164105.000|20101222164107.000|CC1|SCISSORS TO GET THEM OUT.

20101222164111.000|20101222164112.000|CC1|MOVES EASILY.                   
20101222164112.000|20101222164114.000|CC1|ONE THING IT PRODUCES ROUGH     
20101222164114.000|20101222164115.000|CC1|INJURIES, WHERE A LOT OF        
20101222164115.000|20101222164116.000|CC1|INJURIES ARE COMING FROM.       
20101222164116.000|20101222164117.000|CC1|ANOTHER INNOVATION, THE         
20101222164117.000|20101222164119.000|CC1|CARDBOARD BACK, THE BUBBLE FRONT
20101222164119.000|20101222164121.000|CC1|AND CARDBOARD BACK AND PEELS    
20101222164121.000|20101222164121.000|CC1|OFF.                            
20101222164121.000|20101222164123.000|CC1|ALSO, RETAILERS SAY THAT CAUSES 
20101222164123.000|20101222164125.000|CC1|A THEFT ISH SUE BUT STILL A     
20101222164125.000|20101222164126.000|CC1|BETTER EXPERIENCE FOR CONSUMERS.

20101222164128.000|20101222164130.000|CC1|FLIP IT OVER AND SEE IT WILL BE
